data.title: Castle Scoop: The Lying Game's Alexandra Chando to Make Like Miley Cyrus
data.meta_description: Here’s small comfort for fans of ABC Family’s gone-too-soon The Lying Game: Alexandra Chando will soon be on your screens again — on Castle and hopefully minus a big, foam finger. RELATED | ‘Ship Shape: How Your Fave Pairs From […]
data.text:
Here’s small comfort for fans of ABC Family’s gone-too-soon The Lying Game: Alexandra Chando will soon be on your screens again — on Castle and hopefully minus a big, foam finger.

RELATED | ‘Ship Shape: How Your Fave Pairs From Castle, Bones and Other Shows Are Faring

The ABC series’ creator Andrew W. Marlowe tells TVLine that the actress will guest-star in this season’s 11th episode — the first outing after winter hiatus — as “a Lindsay Lohan/Miley Cyrus type who has had a big public meltdown. She’s somebody who has turned from America’s sweetheart into the kind of person who might twerk on MTV.

“It’s a good, fun character,” Marlowe adds — and one who will trigger a bit of an epiphany for one of the show’s main players.

RELATED | Castle‘s Nathan Fillion Proposes a Beach Wedding for Rick and Kate

In addition to her run as Lying Game twins Emma and Sutton, Chando’s TV credits include As the World Turns and The WB’s Rockville CA.

Want more scoop on Castle, or for any other show? Email insideline@tvline.com and your question may be answered via Matt’s Inside Line.
